entry.title: MasteringFingerboardw/Felix
entry.content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qp-Ustkr75k&feature=share

  1. 把線性的音階用各種方式來重新組合吸收：3度、4度、5度, diatonic arpeggio等等… 有點像透過窮舉各種組合來對音階達到完全的吸收（樂理上跟聲響上）
  2. Felix主要用的是3 notes per string, 但他另一個層面上的窮舉是：將在3 notes per string的練習帶到2 notes, 4 notes等等
  3. Stop looking for shortcuts and just do the works!
  4. Think how scales sound on other chords(?) which will helps your improve solo.
    • Play a opposite scale a third higher of the chord. e.g. Play E minor scale over CMaj7, Play Eb Major scale over Cmin7. By doing this you can avoid starting from the root( which you may do in your every improv) and get a different sound.
